main_definition: The number 100 or a group of one hundred items, often used metaphorically to indicate a large quantity.

meanings_and_examples.example: There are 150 people in the room, but I'm only counting up to a hundred.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a unit of measurement for groupings or quantities equivalent to one hundred units.
meanings_and_examples.example: He collected hundreds of stamps from different countries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression used metaphorically to indicate an enormous quantity, similar to saying 'a lot'.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company made a hundred sales in just one week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A stage or phase of life that comprises 100 years.
meanings_and_examples.example: They celebrated their two-hundredth wedding anniversary last month.
